title: What's your opinion about the front camera of the Poco X3? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all lets just appreciate POCOfor not giving us a rebranded phone AGAIN. KUDOS for that. Im glad you asked. So, it comes with a ugly pill shape cut out again (as per the pics I've seen) . Which is the kind of design I'd prefer in a smartphone. Rumours say that it will with same 20+2 mp camera system. I hope at least now they won't add the useless depth camera again. Which also distracts me while doing something on phone. I’d pray God that they will add a wide angle camera now.
Poco x3 comes with 20MP front camera which is quiet good, as the software builts many features to its main and Rear camera the selfie shetters well.
